item.description:
If you're like me you haven't picked up a golf club in many many months. Please join me at Tunxis Fore in Farmington to get back into "swing" of things (bad pun intended). Whether your brand new to golf or a polished golfer, we can all use a little practice. So grab a bucket of balls and start swinging.

Afterwards, if anyone is interested, we'll go to Wood and Tap down the street for a little dinner or drinks.

I hope to have some information I can share about lessons in the area. I'll also post on the site whatever I find out.
item.name: Tunxis Fore - Driving Range
